text: -Do you think there's any meaning in taking this work?

U-Um...!
I want to... I want to give it a go...!

I'm not sure if it's really... a reason like
the Producer would've talked about, but...

──I've... finally been able... to be together with
all of you again, like we used to be.

We can always be together.
...No need to be on a stage for that.

D-Do you think...
...t-that might be true...?

When you all just... keep on going...
W-When Toru-chan just... keeps on going...

A──and I want... so I want...
I want to try and keep up...!

-but, hey, let's go.
It's the sea. This place.

-Wow...!
The fireworks show is going to be seaside, then...!

It's fine, isn't it?
Even if you don't have a reason to go.

S-So...!
We can go, right!? The four of us...!?

G-Great...!
Is it fine if I go tell the Producer!?
